segments.text: Are you coming to the bridal shower for Jane ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . When is the wedding ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: August bride . How nice ! By the way , who is going to be the matron of honor ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yeah ? I wonder who is going to give Jane away at the wedding . You know her father passed away several years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so . The wedding will be held at her church , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Red Rochester will officiate at the wedding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know where they will go on their honeymoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Jane says they will go to China .
segments.speaker: S1
